name: sample-cy-intercept
description: Exemplo de utilização do método intercept

scripts.test: npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=mochawesome-report,overwrite=false,html=false,json=true && npx mochawesome-merge mochawesome-report/*.json > mochawesome-report/mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome-report/mochawesome.json

author: ernestosbarbosa
